group_1.textLeft: Yeah!
We'll bring in people from the outside as tourists,@and show them all of the attractions in the village!
So let's spread the word far and wide!

group_1.textRight: ...And that would help the village?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!
If the shogun were here, he'd definitely agree@with me!

group_1.textRight: The shogun...?@As in, the Tokugawa?
Huh...@I didn't realize they were still around.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that's not who we meant.
The shogun Charu is referring to is the main@character in her favorite drama.

group_1.textRight: Drama...@[chara:801000:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:801000:cheek_0][chara:801000:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:801000:lipSynch_1]Ah, like the ones on TV, right?
...Anyway, Auntie, Mother,
Thanks to Charu, we were able to figure out the@village's appeal!
I'm sure Sunao and I would never have found them@on our own.

group_1.textLeft: Shizuka...

group_1.textRight: Yes...
If I can use my abilities to help the village, then I'll@try it, even if it's tourism.

group_1.textLeft: Sunao, you too...

group_1.textRight: But it'll be difficult if it's just the three of us.
That's why we need your help!

group_1.textLeft: Please, Mom!
Hmm...

group_1.textRight: Don't you think it'd be okay?
I like trying new thingsâ€” it's exciting.

group_1.textLeft: Well, you're the kind of person who gets excited@over anything...

group_1.textRight: What? You're exaggerating!

group_1.textLeft: All three of you are so serious...@[chara:800600:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:800600:cheek_0][chara:800600:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:800600:lipSynch_1]Very well.
Mom...!

group_1.textRight: But starting a tourism business out of nowhere will@never work.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: So let's do a test run first.

group_1.textLeft: A test run?

group_1.textRight: You have an aunt who lives in the city, right?

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, on dad's side!

group_1.textRight: Yes, that's who I was thinking of.
During New Year's, she mentioned that she's always@wanted to live in the country.
If you can figure out how to entice them, they may@be drawn to the village and will come visit.

group_1.textLeft: Oh!

group_1.textRight: Just as I thought, you have a lot of connections!

group_1.textLeft: ...No, it's typical of people who live outside@the village.
Besides, this isn't just for Charu.
Shizuka and Sunao are asking for this, too.

group_1.textRight: Auntie...!

group_1.textCenter: (...In other words, if it were just me, I wouldn't have@been able to convince her?)
(Of course that would be the case.)
(Those two are more reliable and dependable to this@village than I am.)

group_1.textRight: [chara:800600:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wh-what?

group_1.textLeft: I'll be their tour guide! I've got this!

group_1.textRight: Oh?
Well, they haven't even said they'll come yet.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, right! Then I'll take care of that, too, Mom!
I'll convince them and do all the planning!

group_1.textRight: Are you sure...?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, we can help come up with things, too!
Right, Sunao?

group_1.textRight: Yes!
...But when it comes to introducing new things to@the village,
I'm certain some of us will feel uneasy.
So I'll go to everyone and explain what's happening.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you very much.
Alright! I'm gonna pull an all-nighter and brainstorm!

group_1.textRight: Your relatives won't be arriving tomorrow, not even@if you pull an all-nighter.

group_1.textLeft: Jeez...
